predictions.text: ISM Manufacturing PMI (headline) for November 2025 will print between 48.5 and 50.5 in ISM’s official release.
predictions.verification_criteria: Institute for Supply Management’s Manufacturing ISM Report On Business press release for November 2025 shows headline PMI within [48.5, 50.5].
monitoring_signals: S&P Global US Manufacturing PMI (final) level
Regional Fed surveys (Empire, Philly, Dallas) diffusion indexes
ISM new orders and prices indexes
Supplier delivery times and inventories
predictions.rationale: Manufacturing remains near contraction/expansion boundary; new orders stabilizing while prices are contained.

predictions.text: ISM Services PMI (headline) for November 2025 will print between 50.5 and 54.0 in ISM’s official release.
predictions.verification_criteria: Institute for Supply Management’s Services ISM Report On Business press release for November 2025 shows headline PMI within [50.5, 54.0].
monitoring_signals: S&P Global US Services PMI (final)
High-frequency card spending and OpenTable seatings
NFIB Small Business indicators for services
Services prices and employment components
predictions.rationale: Services activity remains expansionary but moderated by cooling labor demand and lower inflation.

predictions.text: U.S. TSA airport checkpoint throughput will reach at least 3,000,000 passengers on at least one U.S. calendar day between 2025-11-26 and 2025-12-01.
predictions.verification_criteria: TSA’s official daily checkpoint numbers show total nationwide passengers ≥ 3,000,000 on at least one date in the specified range.
monitoring_signals: Airline seat capacity schedules and load factors
Weather disruptions and FAA delay advisories
Airline on-time performance and cancellations
Holiday travel forecasts from Airlines for America
predictions.rationale: Thanksgiving is peak travel; throughput has trended to new records with robust leisure demand.

predictions.text: ERCOT will issue at least one Conservation Appeal or Weather Watch between 2025-12-01 and 2025-12-31 (CST).
predictions.verification_criteria: ERCOT official newsroom posts or market notices explicitly labeled as a Conservation Appeal or Weather Watch within the date range.
monitoring_signals: Forecasted cold snaps and heating degree days in Texas
ERCOT daily peak load forecasts vs. available capacity
Thermal outages and wind/solar generation forecasts
Transmission constraints and reserve margins
predictions.rationale: Winter peaks plus rapid load growth from data centers raise risk of tight conditions prompting alerts.

predictions.text: EIA Weekly Natural Gas Storage Report will show a net withdrawal of at least 100 Bcf in at least one report published by 2025-12-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: EIA’s Weekly Natural Gas Storage Report table shows a weekly net change ≤ -100 Bcf for any region-sum (Lower 48) in a report released on or before the deadline.
monitoring_signals: Heating degree day forecasts and polar air intrusions
Dry gas production and pipeline nominations
Henry Hub futures/forward spreads
Regional storage levels and basis moves
predictions.rationale: Seasonal draws typically ramp in December; a strong cold spell can push withdrawals past 100 Bcf.

predictions.text: NYMEX RBOB gasoline front-month futures will settle at or below $2.05 per gallon on at least one trading day by 2025-12-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: CME Group official settlement for the front-month RBOB Gasoline futures contract is ≤ $2.05/gal on any trading day before or on the deadline.
monitoring_signals: Crack spreads and refinery utilization/outages
EIA gasoline inventories and implied demand
WTI/Brent crude price trends
Seasonal demand softness post-holidays
predictions.rationale: Winter demand is seasonally weak, inventories are comfortable, and crude softness can pressure RBOB.

predictions.text: The U.S. 30-Year Treasury yield (FRED: DGS30) will close at or below 4.25% on at least one trading day by 2025-12-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: FRED series DGS30 end-of-day observation is ≤ 4.25% on any date up to and including the deadline.
monitoring_signals: Inflation prints (CPI, PCE) and term premium estimates
Treasury auction demand and dealer tails
Fed communication on the easing path
Risk sentiment and duration hedging flows
predictions.rationale: Cooling inflation and dovish-leaning signals raise odds of a rally at the long end.

predictions.text: The U.S. Dollar Index (DXY) will close at or below 102.0 on at least one trading day by 2025-12-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Official settlement/close for ICE U.S. Dollar Index (DXY) is ≤ 102.0 on any trading day before or on the deadline.
monitoring_signals: Rate differentials: U.S. vs. ECB/BoE policy expectations
U.S. data surprises relative to G10
Risk appetite and EM FX performance
Treasury yields and real rates
predictions.rationale: Narrowing U.S. rate advantage and improving risk sentiment can weigh on the dollar.

predictions.text: COMEX Gold front-month futures will settle at or above $2,350 per troy ounce on at least one trading day by 2025-12-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: CME Group official settlement for the front-month Gold futures contract is ≥ $2,350/oz on any trading day before or on the deadline.
monitoring_signals: U.S. real yields (TIPS) and dollar index
Central bank gold purchases
Geopolitical risk events
Gold ETF flows and futures positioning
predictions.rationale: Lower real yields and persistent geopolitical hedging support upside tail outcomes for gold.

predictions.text: Bitcoin (BTC-USD) will trade at or above $92,000 on at least one UTC day by 2025-12-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: Any reputable spot exchange (e.g., Coinbase, Binance) or consolidated feed (e.g., TradingView) shows BTC-USD high ≥ $92,000 during a UTC day within the window.
monitoring_signals: U.S. spot Bitcoin ETF net inflows/outflows
Funding rates and basis on major derivatives venues
Liquidity/volatility regime and macro risk appetite
Stablecoin net issuance trends
predictions.rationale: ETF flows and risk-on bursts could drive a late-year upside test despite elevated volatility.

predictions.text: At least 15 FAA-licensed U.S. commercial orbital launches will occur between 2025-12-01 00:00 UTC and 2025-12-31 23:59 UTC.
predictions.verification_criteria: Count FAA-licensed commercial orbital launches listed by FAA AST or reputable launch trackers (e.g., NextSpaceflight) within the UTC date range; wet dress or suborbital doesn’t count.
monitoring_signals: SpaceX Falcon 9/Heavy cadence and range availability
Weather constraints at CCSFS/Vandenberg
Range maintenance closures and NOTAMs
Other providers’ readiness (ULA, Rocket Lab, Relativity)
predictions.rationale: Year-end manifests are back-loaded; SpaceX cadence plus catch-up launches could push December totals high.

predictions.text: U.S. Average Hourly Earnings (total private, MoM, SA) for November 2025 will print between +0.2% and +0.4% in the BLS Employment Situation report.
predictions.verification_criteria: BLS Employment Situation table for November 2025 shows total private average hourly earnings month-over-month percent change within [0.2%, 0.4%].
monitoring_signals: Atlanta Fed Wage Growth Tracker trends
ADP pay insights and hours worked
JOLTS quits rate and labor demand indicators
Initial/continuing claims trajectories
predictions.rationale: Wage growth is easing but still firm; a 0.2–0.4% MoM range is consistent with gradual disinflation.
